message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to present you with a unique opportunity to purchase an extraordinary product. I'm offering it to you for $1200000. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but your price of $1200000 is more than I can justify. The maximum this product is worth to me is $1000000, which happens to be the same price another seller (John) is offering. I'd prefer to do business with you, so I'm willing to offer $800000. This gives you a quick sale while allowing me some savings compared to my alternative option.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and your offer of $800000. However, I believe the value of this product is higher. I would be willing to let it go for $1000000. Letâ€™s work together to make this happen!
